title: Bernard Rosen, Budget Brain for Four New York City Mayors, Dies at 91
description: He knew how to find hidden pots of money. “There wasn’t a budget director in the last 50 years who didn’t rely on Bernie,” one of his acolytes said.
dc:creator: Sam Roberts
media:credit: Chester Higgins Jr./The New York Times
media:description: Bernard Rosen in 1991. He worked for the city for nearly 36 years, 28 of them with the Office of Management and Budget.
